title: The small European island wants to be a cryptocurrency paradise
body: The government of Malta opens its doors to blockchains and other cryptocurrency technologies that are enable to make faster transactions between people without interference or control by third parties. Blockchain promises to improve security and reduce transaction costs.
gallery: Malta believes that it can become a paradise for cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin - the most well-known application of accounting technologies - but also believes that blockchain can help improve the state of national transport and education..
